file_content.text: What in the world would make you think I know where to find a criminal? Do I strike you as bad somehow?
I think you're essentially good, and that's why you'll agree to help out.
You strike me as someone who wouldn't want to get in my way.
Ha! You are way off on that score.
Mm. I knew there was something I liked about you, stranger.
Well, you sure got all serious in a hurry. No fun at all.
I have exactly what you need. Come a little closer so I can whisper it to you....
Fine. Ask me your stupid questions....
Tell you what, doll--I'll help. Least I can do, seeing how that's the first good laugh I've had in a while....
I think you're essentially good, and that's why you'll agree to help out.
You strike me as someone who wouldn't want to get in my way.
